section-1-desc: We are path breakers. We love to develop technology that simplifies complexity. Our technology serves as building blocks redefining financial and commodity markets.
gideon-desc: Energy Trading, Carbon Credit Trading, and a comprehensive Carbon Accounting Platform – paving the way to make net zero a reality.
thinker-desc: Traditional loan origination takes somewhere between 35 to 40 days. Thinker LOS with the increased use of automated systems, loan origination is becoming easier and faster.
thinker-wise-desc: Facial Liveness, Face Recognition, OCR for ID identification, and advanced technologies to verify your customers in compliance with global standards. Additionally, integrate with Thai identification and credential checks (such as NDID, NCB, DOPA, and AMLO) to ensure seamless and comprehensive digital onboarding implementation.
argri-desc: World’s first blockchain based platform for agricuture products traceability. For sustainability of Thai farmer, which currently apply on palm oil product.
neobank-desc: Unlock the potential of Digital Lending with us through Thinker Suite – your ultimate solution for seamless, efficient, and scalable financial innovation for digital lending business.
vc-desc:
-Verified Credentials

-Digital Credentials are reshaping Education

-Verified credentials by offering a seamless method to issue, hold, and verifty credentials through blockchain.
consists-of-highly-qualified: We focus on goals and results.
our-team-desc: We are ambitious, responsible individuals, who are driven by a strong desire to accomplish meaningful and important team goals. We make time, collaborate effectively to help colleagues to achieve their goals.
